EmailTemplate.name: QMX Work Order Rejection
EmailTemplate.subject: Work Order - Rejected: {!Work_Order__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear User,
The work order ({!Work_Order__c.Name}) has been rejected. Please check and resubmit for approval.
Approver Comment : {!ApprovalRequest.Comments}
To review the work order, please click on the following link.
{!Work_Order__c.Link}
Thank you.
NOTE: This is a system generated message. Please do not reply to this email.
